sentences.en: A hundred years ago coronary heart disease was virtually unknown in Europe and America.
sentences.cn: 在100年前冠心病几乎不存在于欧洲和美洲。

sentences.en: A muscular spasm in the coronary artery can cause a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 冠状动脉的肌肉痉挛可能导致心脏病。

sentences.en: A thrombosis of a coronary artery is shown here in cross section.
sentences.cn: 此横截面显示冠状动脉血栓形成.

sentences.en: Are you at high risk of having a coronary?
sentences.cn: 你有冠状动脉高危症状 吗 ?

sentences.en: Conclusions coronary atherosclerosis in humans is characterized by local production of Lp - PLA 2.
sentences.cn: 结论-人类早期冠状动脉粥样硬化以脂蛋白相关磷脂酶A2局部产物为特征.

sentences.en: Effects were larger for those angiographically demonstrated coronary artery disease.
sentences.cn: 对那些经冠脉造影证实为冠心病的患者影响更大.

sentences.en: Even grafting new blood vessels in place of the diseased coronary arteries has been tried.
sentences.cn: 甚至移植新血管代替不健康的冠状动脉的方法都已经试过.

sentences.en: Evidence suggestive of an association between clinical coronary disease and CO exposure includes the following.
sentences.cn: 显示临床心血管病与一氧化碳暴露之间具有关系的证据,有如下几个方面.

sentences.en: Left sinus of valsalva was devoid of left coronary artery.
sentences.cn: 左冠状窦内无左冠状动脉起源.

sentences.en: Nine of the 14 patients with coronary artery disease decreased lactate extraction with increasing COHB.
sentences.cn: 在14位冠状动脉病患者中,发现有九位由于一氧化碳增加,其乳酸盐的浸出量减低.

sentences.en: Restenosis is a major complication after percutaneous transluminal coronary intervention.
sentences.cn: 冠脉再狭窄是冠状动脉介入术后最主要的并发症之一.

sentences.en: The coronary ostia are involved in the dissection.
sentences.cn: 解剖时要牵动冠状动脉口.

sentences.en: The greatest occurrence of coronary heart disease is in those over 65.
sentences.cn: 65岁以上者是冠心病的最高发人群。

sentences.en: The presence of angina indicates significant coronary ischemia.
sentences.cn: 心绞痛本身说明有明显的冠状动脉供血不足.

sentences.en: We already knew that walking can reduce adult - onset diabetes and coronary heart disease.
sentences.cn: 我们已知道,散步能降低成人患糖尿病和冠心病的机会.

words.tran_cn: 冠状的；日冕的；头颅的；花冠的；舌尖音的
（王子、贵族等戴的）小冠冕；冠状头饰；（马的）蹄冠

phrases.tran_cn: 冠状动脉旁路；冠状动脉绕道手术；冠状动脉分流术
n. 冠状动脉粥样硬化
冠状动脉粥样硬化性心脏病
冠状动脉旁路手术；冠状动脉架桥术

trans.tran_cn: 冠的，花冠的，冠状的，冠状动脉或静脉的
